title: CGI Art Video Goes Viral As Hurricane Shaheen
htmlTitle: CGI Art Video Goes Viral As Hurricane Shaheen
snippet: Oct 29, 2021 ... ... “Hurricane Shaheen on the shores of Oman.” Newschecker found the video is an animation created by an American artist, Brent Shavnore.
htmlSnippet: Oct 29, 2021 ... ... “Hurricane Shaheen on the shores of Oman.” Newschecker found the video is an animation created by an American artist, Brent Shavnore.

metatags.og:description: A 24-second long video showing a massive cyclone on a coast, looming over a cityscape  went viral on social media with the claim that it showed, “Hurricane Shaheen on the shores of Oman.” Newschecker found the video is an animation created by an American artist, Brent Shavnore.

metatags.og:title: This video is a digital animation and does not show a deadly storm in Oman
metatags.og:description: A video of a gathering storm looming over a coastal city is being shared on social media with a claim that it shows Hurricane Shaheen, a deadly cyclone that recently caused widespread damage in Oman. The claims are false; the clip was created with animation software and a composite image back in 2019.
metatags.twitter:creator: @afpfactuel
